Reviews.Title: Awesome and powerful for the price
Reviews.Author: DragonKing1812
Reviews.Content: Wallmart 478.00 laptop and its screaming fast and plenty powerful for any daily use, and perfect for the typical gamer, may be a little week for the hard core gamers, but I can run DMC and DarkSiders all on High rez (not ultra) with no noticeable lag

Reviews.Title: AWesOMe
Reviews.Author: Harrison
Reviews.Content: Awesome computer I can play bf3,crysis 3,far cry 3,sky rim, grid, dayz, Tomb raider.... basically anything I have thrown at it.

Reviews.Title: Seems like a Smart Buy
Reviews.Author: Bill Hechmer
Reviews.Content: Excellent price.  Seems to be a good daily worker laptop.  Its being run about 8 hours per day, and no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Second Time Was A Charm!
Reviews.Author: Linda Hoffman
Reviews.Content: The first computer had some problems immediately, so I contacted Amazon who contacted the seller.  I was contacted back immediately with a return label and instructions, along with a note from the seller.  I shipped the computer back, they sent us a replacement and it started right up with no problems.  My grandson is ecstatic with it!  I think the operative word here is "immediately".  Service was excellent, and the second time around, so was the computer!  Thank you all!

Reviews.Title: gateway nv52
Reviews.Author: Silenmusicio21
Reviews.Content: love this computer.  very quick whether im using wifi or Ethernet and altogether a flawless, seamless design. would definitely recommend to a friend....

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Ciscoriko "Alex"
Reviews.Content: It is amazing it can run any game best money I've ever spent I recommended it to anyone looking for a cheap computer that works great windows 8 is good and it can do alot of thing

Reviews.Title: Seems pretty good so far
Reviews.Author: Mason M
Reviews.Content: I just got this as a graduation present. So far it seems to be working fine, no major issues with anything. Not exactly digging Windows 8, but I'll either learn to get used to it or have my friend install Windows 7.It can run Minecraft with fancy graphics and regular render distance pretty well, although I don't know how it might handle higher-res texture packs. I'll have to try one out.Be careful not to block the little vent on the bottom.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT for the price!
Reviews.Author: A. Melendez
Reviews.Content: Hello.Usually don't buy "full-size" laptops anymore (really like the battery life and usability of netbooks) but a few months ago I wanted something more powerful to run/play movies and maybe some light gaming. So decided on buying a lappy with a decent processor/gpu and most of them were actually quite expensive then... enter Gateway NV52L23u!!For the price you get a very decent CPU (AMD Quad Core Processor), with 6GB of RAM, 750GB hard Disk, etc. but more surprising is the "video card" output. Since this is a Trinity CPU, it comes with a Radeon HD 7640G embedded and I have to say I was very surprised with its performance. Installed Steam, played a few games (of course it doesn't play them in the highest settings but I'm good with it!) and it performed admirably!The only cons against it... Battery life is not that hot. If I can get 4 to 5 hours of continuous use, it's a miracle (and this is with lower brightness settings). My netbook yields like 10 hours or so with it's 6cell battery. I know I know, netbooks don't drain nor use components as power hungry as bigger laptops, but still, I was so used to that... As far as I know, there is not a bigger battery for this laptop. Also, some performance seem to be sluggish. Running Firefox with multiple tabs is a chore, strangely, Chrome runs EXCELLENT! Go figure. Finally WiFi seems to hit some snags sometimes (signal related) but it's not so bad.All in all, for the price I paid (which was LESS than $300... i.e. that's netbook pricing!) I LOVE IT!Looks good, performs well, no problems so far == Happy Customer!Thanks.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Randall McGaw
Reviews.Content: It got here before it was scheduled to be here. I had reservations about buying refurbished but it was very clean and runs great. I love this laptop and would recommend it to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Cool looking, fast computer, with a couple of minor issues.
Reviews.Author: S. Adams "S. Adams"
Reviews.Content: If I could I would give it 4.5 stars. It's a very nimble computer, once you replace Win 8 with Win 7 Ultimate. It works quickly and without a hitch. The following are keeping me from giving it a 5 star rating:No indicators for when Caps and/or Num lock are on or off (really??? What were they thinking?)Audio quality is pretty weak.Other than that, love the look and feel of it, as well as the awesome performance.

Reviews.Title: Great addition!
Reviews.Author: Yasmin Dudley
Reviews.Content: First I love the red and white casing. Easy to navigate at night and see the keyboard. Loving that it is 6GB ram. Also the graphic card is pretty powerful. Now I can see HD movies easily.I t's very fast. Lots of unnecessary programs. Best deal with these specs. Have had it for 5 months and it's working great. The number keyboard is great for my Excel spreadsheet work. I recommend it. Wish they did more colors than the usual grey, blue and black.

Reviews.Title: like it so far
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like the color. :) Windows 8 does take some getting used to but it can be done. The only prob I had is that it had nics in it and a cpl scratches. Not real noticeable but still there. Also the keyboard back piece (red part) is raised in the middle under the keys im assuming were they worked on it after all it is a refurb. overall I am happy with it and it runs really well. would recommend.

Reviews.Title: lots of problems
Reviews.Author: JayCee
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer at wal-mart for like 450 4 months ago and it's shuts down automatically all of the time instead of sleeping, I've had to reboot it like 3 or 4 times now where it stopped working correctly( I lost a lot of pictures and files), and the speakers are already scratchy. I'm ready to sell it already after 4 months. not worth the 450 and definitely not worth the 700 they are asking for it on here. won't be buying from gateway again.

Reviews.Title: A great first Laptop.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This product being a gateway, it will indeed have its problems, if it is used corectly. The processor and as well as the graphics card is...alright, but not as good as it could be. But, when it comes to some gaming and as well as some operation systems. It is a very good choice to pick. But, like all computers you cannot let it sit on the charger, it will quickly die in within a month, and it will leave you needing to buy a new battery. Never run this laptop like it is a desktop, it will burn and fry the components, like the ram and video card. Keep Gaming looks (Resolution) in the medium rang. Yes, it can be a little higher, but that is it.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: jen mueller
Reviews.Content: Bought a Gateway NV52L23u Notebook. When it arrived it was not working. Only produced a white screen. DIGJUNGLE has not contacted me after 5 days, after amazon told me they were going to contact them. This is a nightmare.
